title: Scotland Picturesque and Traditional. A pilgrimage with staff and knapsack
author: Todd, George Eyre.
snippet: At a later day it Avas bought back by the city,Avhich before long sold its materials for a few hundred pounds, andgranted the site for county buildings. A plaque in the Avail of thesebuildings in Tay Street is all that noAv remains to mark the spot.
